title: New: San Mei – Brighter
content: Australia’s San Mei first featured on these pages at the start of the year, and predictably has now been picked up by a label (I jest…). Her debut single proper, Brighter, is released midway through next month, and showcases the dreamy, perfect pop that made her couple of debut tracks so enticing. Check out Brighter below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
